Summary Heading: Excellent Apartment Across From The Pier
Summary: Excellent one-bedroom fully furnished apartment right across the street from the San Clemente pier.  Parking is limited in the area but guests get one reserved space at the resort.  Not sure what happens if all the spaces are full but a guest next door told us that he has been a guest for years and never had that problem.  Food and drink are available mere feet away on the same street and at the pier.
Room tip: There is a Metrolink train that runs through across the street at 5:30 a.m. but I was already up...
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us. We're so happy you found the location to suit your needs in terms of furnishings and proximity to the pier. To answer your question, we have one compact parking space per room on property. This means each room has one spot for their entire stay. We truly hope you'll be back to stay with us again soon.

Summary: 2nd time at Seahorse   Everyone is nice, beautiful ocean view rooms are clean with nice kitchen and big refrigerator.  Great location for grabbing food and hitting shopping malls. Trolley pickup super close. We keep going back for quiet beautiful views. Oh beach across street
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us! We truly hope you'll be back to stay with us again soon!

Summary: I love this hotel/resort for several reasons. This hotel is very clean, great location and friendly/professional staff. Parking was easy and conveniently located. The oceanfront deluxe studio was perfect.  My check in with Tiyona was very welcoming. This was my second stay and it was wonderful.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking a moment to review your stay with us! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed the location and view from your room, and that you found the staff to be friendly and professional. We hope to have you back to stay with us again soon!

Summary: This was my second stay at the Sea Horse Resort, and it was as fantastic as the first time. It was my and my husband's first real vacation together, and we absolutely loved it. Our room included a King bed and a lovely balcony that looked out onto the ocean and the San Clemente pier, along with a kitchen, nice bathroom, and a sitting room.  We stayed 5 nights, so it was great to have a dresser and side tables to keep things in, along with a rack and hangers to hang our nice clothes on.  The kitchen was awesome, they had it stocked with all of the dishes and utensils we could possibly want, along with pots and pans to use on the gas stove. It also had a full size fridge and a microwave. The sitting room had a large tv and couches, and there was a dining table we could pull out if
Room tip: I'd highly recommend springing for a room with a view. You can hear the ocean at all times.
Manager Response: We are so happy to know that you enjoyed your balcony as well as the beach amenities that we provide. We truly appreciate your feedback and we can't wait to have you and your husband back again soon!

Summary: We stayed here after coming up for a day trip.  Our room was fabulous.  Two patios facing the ocean with a beautiful view.  I will definitely stay here again.  This would be a great family vacation stay as there were two rooms, two bathrooms, a full kitchen and a large living room.   The only odd thing was someone left a package of raw chicken outside our front door in the morning.  Not sure what that was about but it’s a funny memory.
Manager Response: Dear Chloe,   We're so happy that you enjoyed the view from your balconies. While we're still scratching our heads and trying to figure out who left the chicken. We're grateful you were able to have a good laugh and make lasting memories while here in San Clemente. Please come back and stay with us again next year!

Summary: Sea Horse Resort San Clemente, CA  Staff is friendly. Rooms are clean and you cannot beat the location. Friends and I stayed over a weekend in October and the weather was perfect for the beach. We can’t wait to come back.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking a moment to review your stay with us. We are elated to know that you found our staff to be friendly and the location unbeatable. We truly can't wait to have you and your friends back to stay with us!

Summary: We vacationed here over the summer and will make Sea Horse our home away from home whenever in San Clemente! Location is the perfect proximity to the pier/beach as well as local shops and restaurants. Staff was courteous and willing to go above and beyond to assist with dinner reservations. Due to covid a few things had changed like having to wear masks in the lobby and housekeeping not coming into rooms to clean, but they did a daily service which brought us fresh linens which was sufficient. Overall, we had a relaxing and peaceful stay at the Sea Horse and can’t wait to come back!
Manager Response: Dear emily g,  Thank you so much for your words of praise! We are so happy to know that you found your stay at the Sea Horse a pleasant retreat for you and your family. We appreciate your feedback and can't wait to have you back again soon!

Summary: This was our 3rd stay at Sea Horse and was the best. They have renovated the units. We stayed in #4. The location can’t be beat!  I adore San Clemente and this hotel is the spot to be. The unit was huge. Full kitchen and huge balcony. Do yourself a favor and book here.  *unable to select actual month we stayed. Oct 2020*
Manager Response: Dear Amymv74,   Yowzas! Thank you so much for taking a moment to review your stay with us. We can't tell you enough how grateful we are to have return guests like you. We're so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and truly appreciate your feedback. We can't wait to have you back again for your 4th stay!

Summary: While it is located close to the beach, it was sad to view a homeless population out in front of the resort, every time we sat on our balcony. The walls are very thin and we heard loud dogs running around above us. Management was quite rude and unwelcoming. Our room was not ready at check-in. We had to come back twice after the designated check-in time to finally get in our room. We viewed a  maintenance man smoking a cigarette  on the steps to our room as we were waiting to get in. Not a great impression. I would suggest spending your money elsewhere.
Manager Response: Dear Tropicalgem,  Thank you for taking a moment to review your stay with us. On behalf of the team, I want to apologize that your room was not ready at time of check-in. It is our standard to have rooms ready by 3 PM and we understand that missing this goal not only starts your vacation off on the wrong foot, it is a true inconvenience. We believe there may be confusion in terms of staff as we have one Maintenance Manager who does not smoke. Any staff member found smoking on this property would be immediately disciplined as we take our no-smoking policies very seriously. While we cannot control the members of our community, we can control our actions and how we treat our guests. As manager of the property, I want to personally apologize for any interaction that we may have had that resulted in you finding me rude and unwelcoming. Unwelcome is the absolute last thing on earth I'd want a guest to walk away from our resort feeling and for that I cannot apologize enough. If you would like, I would be grateful for the opportunity to speak with you more about your stay on the phone to see how we can improve our guest experience and learn from these fumbles. If not, I understand and  I wish you all the best on your future travels to San Clemente.

Summary: Right on the beach next to the San Clemente pier, great seafood on the pier, awesome pizza joint down the block, perfect beach access. Room was comfortable, parking was a little tight, don’t drive anything big to stay here. Staff was friendly. No better location if you wanna spend a week at the beach!!
Manager Response: Dear Mike L,    Thank you so much for taking a moment to review your stay with us!  We are so glad to hear you found our rooms to be comfortable and the location convenient for your vacation needs. The 4th of July is one of the most special days of the year here in San Clemente and we can't wait to hopefully have fireworks back at the pier next year. We hope to have you back again soon and definitely for our 2021 celebration of the 4th!

Summary: Had the pleasure of staying here last summer on the word of a close friend that this would be the nicest, most hospitable stay in San Clemente, and we weren't disappointed! This hotel is not a chain, so everything is done with a personal touch. The staff is so nice and quick to respond to any questions or concerns. You can really tell just how much love is put into this place. Kayla made our stay extra special by making reservations for my fiancé and I at a lovely local restaurant to celebrate our recent engagement.  Situated right across the street to the beach, you're close to so much this tiny town has to offer. The staff are locals, so they always know which place is best to get the full experience. The hotel is inviting, the rooms are large, clean, well-stocked and overlook
Manager Response: Dear SRHATL,   Thank you so much for taking a moment to review your stay with us! We are so happy to hear that you were able to enjoy all that San Clemente has to offer while staying here at the Sea Horse Resort. We truly appreciate when guests take a moment to acknowledge the hard work of our staff members and we will gladly pass on your words of praise to them. We can't wait to have you back to stay with us again soon!

Summary: What a wonderful stay we had here! Outstanding staff, amazing view, and so close to the beach. Either we got lucky with the sunsets during our stay or that's just a staple of San Clemente, but either way we loved sitting on our balcony watching them every night. The suite didn't feel corporate or cookie cutter like a lot of places, it felt like home. So close to amazing restaurants, and the the walk to the beach was barely noticeable. Will absolutely stay again.

We are the lucky ones as we discovered this unique and value priced beach-front hotel, many years ago and continue to go back for the best "staycation" we can find. Located directly across from a beautiful and historic beach, there are also great restaurants and even a bar over the ocean is famous for their happy hour prices.

I’m a traveling dj, I’ve been to hundreds hotels and resorts.  This was one of my favorite stays I’ve ever had.  The people watching alone... Lots of good food to choose from in the area. Mom and pop convince Store downstairs. The beach is across the street and the customer service is what made this stay so nice. Ashley made sure we had everything we needed to be in the best mood the whole time.  I can’t wait to go back, such a great experience.

From the spectacular view to the luxurious bed, this resort has it all to relax and unwind. The resort was beautifully crafted from the details of the shower and bathroom to the full-sized kitchen, it simply has it all. Add in a generous and kind staff and it truly is the total package. I can't wait for my next trip to San Clemente to stay here again.

Summary Heading: Best location for being on foot!
Summary: We loved our stay at the Seahorse Resort. Not only did they let us park in the lot early we also received a very early check-in, which was superb considering it was a weekend and the beach parking was sparse. When we checked in we were Greeted with 2 complimentary bottles of wine and given 2 free coffee vouchers for the amazing La Galleta Cafe that's downstairs, yum!  Everywhere we went we walked on foot, no need for the car! It was so centrally located to shops, restaurants & Cafès! The room was perfectly equipped with more amenities to cook then I could ever imagine! You could definitely spend a whole month here and cook all your own meals in the suite.  Overall, we can't wait to visit again! Loved it!
Manager Response: Dear Karissa,  We can’t wait to have you back! We’re so happy to know that you found the location and room amenities to be perfect for your stay in San Clemente. We'll be sure to pass along your words of praise to our team members. Sending you good health and happiness until your next visit!

Summary Heading: Location and comfort! Such an enjoyable stay
Summary: My parents were traveling out here for the first time in 10 years due to health and age issues, and my sister and brother in law accompanied them. We had to convince them that this would be better than staying at a generic chain hotel. Little did we know that The SeaHorse would rightfully become one of the highlights of their memorable trip! Certainly not a true "luxury resort" but clean, comfortable, staff was accommodating, and the room and the view (2 bedroom deluxe suite) were simply beyond expectations. You can do nothing and have a wonderful time simply enjoying the windows and the balconies. Having a large common living area and kitchen was an added bonus. The view, the  pier, the beach, the trains, the shops and restaurants along the street...when my parents were
Manager Response: Dear RSMBobH,  Thank you so much for convincing your family to stay at the Sea Horse! We love when guests take a leap of faith on us and we love it even more when they make unforgettable memories while staying with us. We truly hope to have you back to stay with us again soon. In the meantime, we're sending you and your family wishes for good health and happiness until your next visit!

Summary: We have stayed at the Sea horse over 7 times in the past 5 years.  We selected the resort based on location to the ocean and the incredible views.  We have been coming back because of the amazing service and since the have updated some of the rooms the accommodations are a 10.  We have been coming to San Clemente since 2004. We have stayed ate other properties and VRBO’s. The Sea horse is by far the best.  One other benefit of the Sea Horse is the staff.  You need anything all you have to do is ask.  The manager is extremely professional and he is always asking how he can make or stay better.  Congratulations on the upgrades and the sitting area, having a park to relax in and watch the waves is a real treat.  Taken from our room #8 last night. This place is magical.
Manager Response: Dear Climber285240,   We're elated to know you've stayed with us 7 times in five years! We're so grateful to have amazing guests like you that return year after year and choose to stay with us above the rest!  We will pass on our words of praise to the members of staff and ownership team. We truly appreciate your loyalty over the years and hope to have you back again soon!

Summary: This was our first time here and we loved it! Close to everything. Beach is just steps from the front door. Beautiful sunsets, friendly people, great food nearby. The accommodations were perfect for us. The kitchen was fully equipped with everything we needed because we love to get local fresh food and cook at home. The staff was wonderful.  I can't say enough good about the Sea Horse! Everything was just great.
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you so much for your sparkling review, crdough! I will pass on your words of praise to our staff because there is nothing we love more than hearing than how great a time our guests had while staying with us. We love the functionality of our kitchens too and it makes vacationing so much for feasible for adventurous travelers and families alike. Dining out can become costly and the money they save on meals can be spent on experiences together. We hope that when you're back in San Clemente that you choose to stay with us again. Thank you so much and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: If you love the ocean, this is the place for you! It’s right across the street from the San Clemente Pier. You do hear the trains during the day, but not at night—they must stop at that time. The staff is extremely friendly and accommodating. Our room was a little small and not one that had been remodeled, but very comfortable; next time we’ll chose a larger one. There are also several restaurants within walking distance. They also provide parking close to your room.
Manager Response: Dear Diane L,   Thank you for your words of praise! I will pass them along to our hard working staff. We're so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us as well as the San Clemente area. We do apologize about the sporadic train noises. After awhile we tend to ignore them and just focus on the sound of the ocean but we know they can be a bit abrasive when you first hear them. We're so happy that the room worked out well for you but we're excited to have you back to enjoy a more spacious suite next time.

Summary: We love this place. It is very very clean, and the location is amazing.  We loved the area of the pier and the staff was super helpful.  We look forward to coming again ASAP.  The patio was great for relaxing and reading. Love Sea Horse Resort.
Manager Response: Dear 70natee,   We love you too! Thank you so much for taking a moment out of your day to review your stay with us. We truly hope you'll be back again soon!

Summary: We just got back from our second stay at the Sea Horse Resort. It has quickly become one of our favorite places to stay. We travel with our pups, and the property is very accommodating with that. The rooms are fantastic and overall feel is serene. The location and value is unbeatable in my view, and we cannot wait to go back.
Manager Response: Dear 421ChrisS,  We are delighted to know that you and your pups have found your home away from home with us. We couldn't imagine traveling without our four-legged friends, so we strive to make this a welcoming location for canine guests too. We truly appreciate you taking a moment to review your stay with us and we hope to have you back again soon!

Summary: We stayed in Unit 6 which is a one bedroom with a partial view of the pier and beach from the living and dining area. We were there in January so it was a little cold since there is only a small heater for the entire unit (there also isn't air conditioning). Perfect size for a couple. You do your own dishes but there is daily towel service. It was awesome to be able to cross the street and be at the pier. The crepe restaurant on the lower level is a breakfast must! Will definately stay here again when visiting San Clemente.
Manager Response: Anna,  We're elated to know that you enjoyed your stay and thought our location was perfect! We know January can be a little chilly but we're happy to know you found the accommodations to your liking. We'd love to have you back during our summer months when you can really take in the San Clemente beach experience. Thank you so much for staying with us and we hope to have you back again soon!

Summary: Omg the view was stunning ! Our room was fabulous we had a very large two bed apartment  Lovely and clean   Cons  Blinds in the bedroom ( almost see through !) they need blackout curtains in the bedrooms as the street lights and hotel signs were so bright it was difficult to get to sleep  Also I’m sure with the light on at night people could see into our room , we made sure we changed in the bathroom .  Noise from the train  It woke us all up it was so loud   Our apartment was so so hot ! and with no aircon it made it uncomfortable at night , I dread to think what it’s like in summer .  We had use of chairs umbrellas and beach towels which was great  We visited crystal cove beach which was incredible absolutely beautiful   The sunsets from our room were amazing !!   Better
Manager Response: daisyduke33,  Thank you for taking a moment to review your stay with us. We appreciate and value the feedback you've provided us because it helps us create a more enjoyable environment for all of our guests. Over the next year we'll be working on installing more blackout curtains into rooms and we hope to have you back once this process is completed. Once again, thank you for your candor and we hope to have you back again soon!

Summary: Reviewing this resort is a little difficult since each room is unique.  We stayed in unit 8 which is a studio on the ground level.  Couldn't beat the view, it was gorgeous.  We loved sitting on the deck and ate most of our meals out there.  In our room, the couch looked out over the water and the bed was in the back.  Good size mini-fridge, small coffee maker and microwave in our sitting area.  There was both a box fan and a portable heater provided. Shower in this unit is very short.  We are both 5'6" and had to crouch in the shower in order to wash our hair.   Being on the ground floor, multiple people thought that our room was the lobby/office.  There is a rope you can put across the stairs to block the entrance to the room, which was handy, but they need better signage for
Manager Response: Dear abenicig,   Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at Sea Horse Resort. We appreciate and value your comments, and will look into improving the height of the shower head in that studio as well as the signage directing guests to the lobby. We're saddened to know that you felt the additional hour of parking was petty. Please know that this was not our intention and that we keep these parking rules to accommodate both our departing and arriving guests in the most orderly of fashions. We pride ourselves on being one of the last few resorts next to the ocean that does not charge a resort service or parking fee and will make every effort to maintain this benefit for the years to come. Once again, thank you so much for the recommendations, we truly do take your feedback to heart and use it to better overall guest experience. We hope to have you back to stay with us again soon!

Summary: We found this hidden gem a couple weeks before our tip in August.  The room was spacious with a full kitchen.  Bed was very comfy and you couldn't beat the location.  We had an issue with the toilet and staff immediately came to fix and even have us a bottle of wine for our trouble.  They had beach chairs, umbrellas and towels which was a surprise.  The trolley is easy to catch to head downtown but is walkable too.  I look forward to returning someday!
Manager Response: Christine B,   We're so happy you enjoyed your experience here at the Sea Horse Resort. We're sorry you experienced plumbing issues but we're grateful we were able to fix them promptly. Please come back and see us again!

Summary: Hotel accomodations were more than my expectations!! Had a 2 room deluxe suite across from the pier. Very spacious,with 2 separate balconies and a kitchen. Staff very friendly and accommodating, especially Kayla! And my dog loved it as well!!!
Manager Response: We're so happy you enjoyed your stay with us! We'll pass on your words of praise to Kayla and the rest of the staff. Please come back and stay with us again soon.

Summary: We had room 9, which is street level with a balcony adjacent to the sidewalk. It had a queen bed and a foldable futon couch. There was a small bathroom but it was adequate. The room came with a mini fridge, microwave, coffee maker, and toaster. Under the bathroom sink, they provided dish soap supposedly to wash dishes. However, there were no dishes to speak of since they had disposable cups for the coffee maker as well as a few in the bathroom for water (which we would not drink because ... well ... California water).   They are in a primo location to watch the sunset over the pier.  The beach is the biggest draw, obviously, and it's right across the street. You'll merely need to cross the train tracks and you are on the pier.  There's a great boardwalk for walkling along the
Manager Response: Navy_Lady,  Thank you so much for taking a moment to review your stay with us. We truly hope to have you back to stay in one of our upper level rooms.

Summary: Our first experience in San Clemente, I was surprised with the super easy convenience.  The parking spot was perfectly located, behind our rooms, and on the other side of the room was a balcony with an view of the beach. Not a crane your neck to peek the top of the beach, but a sand and surfers and palm trees view! Upon check-in, an unexpected surprise, beach chairs, umbrella and beach towels are available for checkout.  (Sand toys are also available for those with little ones!) We have teenagers, and I mentioned surfing.  Our host offered a board rental shop on our way down to the beach!  So thoughtful.  We walked across the street got settled on the beautiful warm sand, and then went back across to the shop to rent a board for the day. Our room was ready, as promised, at 3pm
Manager Response: We're so happy to know you enjoyed your stay with us, Gretchen12414. The vacation you've described is exactly the experience we hope all our guests have while they're staying with us. We wish you all the best and hope to have you and your loved ones back to stay with us again soon.

Summary: The room looked out on the ocean.  The room was on the first floor and had a large patio with chairs and umbrella. Very clean and appealing.  My friend's birthday, we decided to stay an additional day and were able to stay in the same room.
Manager Response: We're so glad you were able to extend your stay with us. We hope your friend had a birthday to remember and that you'll be back to celebrate with us again soon!

Summary: Came here for a family getaway for my husband's birthday. Every one working here was so welcoming and accommodating, the room was great (clean, ceiling fans and big windows so you could enjoy the beach air), and an amazing grassy spot overlooking the water for guests only...This location can not be beat. Hop skip and a jump to the beach, and the city's free trolley to the downtown area picks you up just across the street. We loved our visit to San Clemente and the Seahorse Resort will be our new go to.
Manager Response: Dear  VeraCh789,   You're making us blush! We hope your husband had an amazing birthday and that you come back to stay with us again next year!

Summary: This "resort" is run down condos marketed as a hotel.  The ocean front view is great, but there were no curtains on any of the windows, only sun shades that were transparent at night.  The area was very noisy with buses and the train going past.  There were multiple steps to all levels with no accommodation for handicapped or less agile.  The staff was friendly and accommodating as best they could be under the circumstances.
Manager Response: Dear Brenda Z,   Thank you for taking a moment to review your stay with us. We realize that we're not everyone's cup of tea, but we sure do try to be. Some of the best things about our location are the views from the rooms, and the proximity to the ocean and pier. But with some of the best things, you attract some of the nosier things like public transportation and commotion from tourism. While we may not have been the right fit for your preferences while traveling, we appreciate the feedback and will be working to install more prominent shades in more of our rooms in the near future. Once again, thank you for staying with us and we wish you all the best on your future travels.

Summary: I have been here many times and I’m always so happy to return.  You can’t beat the location right on the beach front amongst some great restaurants.  Thank you to Ashley for your excellent customer service.  I loved our beach front studio with its beachy clean crisp vibe.  The studio was cool on a warm night and once we closed the doors it was quiet.   Thank you for the stay.  It was short but my doggie and I will be back again soon.
Manager Response: Dear ulonmunro,  Thank you for taking a moment to review our resort. We're so happy that you and your doggie enjoyed your stay with us and we hope you'll be back soon!

Summary: We stayed here for 4 days and it is an absolutely beautiful location. We had an ocean front view that was spectacular!! The room was dated but it was clean, well furnished and the kitchen had everything we needed. The view from our balcony far outweighed the dated decor. We had no issues at all during our stay. Check in was smooth as was checkout. Dylan was so friendly and really made us feel welcomed. If you are looking for a beach front hotel, this is the place!! There are wonderful local restaurants with an excellent coffee shop all within walking distance from the hotel. We loved hearing the train go by during the day. It added to the charm of the area. I highly recommend the Sea Horse Resort and we will for sure return again.
Manager Response: Dear Isstucson,  We're so grateful you chose to stay with us while you were in San Clemente. We pride ourselves on being a Mom & Pop Resort and we're so grateful you consider Sea Horse your home away from home when you're in San Clemente!  We will pass along your praise to Dylan and we hope to have you back soon enough!

Summary Heading: A lovely stay at a beautiful beach front apart-hotel - can't recommend enough!
Summary: We really loved this hotel - it was more like an apartment! Our room was so beautiful, a really modern beachy style which was perfect for the location considering it was literally opposite the beach. We had a full sea view room and it was totally worth the money as the view at all times of the day was incredible, we even liked hearing the train noise (which wasn't loud) as it added to the whole feel of the place. It's also worth noting that the place was immaculately clean   The place also had great amenities, with a fridge AND a freezer, fully stocked kitchen equipment, 2 luggage racks, lots of seating (including outside) and the bathroom was beautiful - we loved the huge shower. The huge bed was also really comfortable with lots of pillows and nice bedding. I could go on and
Manager Response: Dear Tom_andNicL,   Thank you so much for taking the time to review the Sea Horse Resort. We're so grateful for your kind words and that you truly enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on our customer service so it means so much to us when guests take the time to give us feedback. We hope that next time you're in Southern California you choose to stay with us again.   Wishing you all the best! Sea Horse Resort

Summary: We are locals and enjoyed one evening in a beachfront room. The building is older and could use an update, but the view was pretty and the kitchen came in handy. The hotel is across the street from the beach.
Manager Response: Dear N5475TCwilliamm,   Thank you so much for taking the time to review our property. We're grateful you chose the Sea Horse Resort as your stay-cation destination and hope you enjoyed your time with us. As the resort looks to the future, we are currently working towards phasing out some of our more mature features. As each room at our property is unique, we  would love to have you back so you can experience all that the resort has to offer.

Summary: The room was very nice with a beautiful view.  We had a few problems though.   There was no shower shelves or soap tray in the shower, so we had to put the shampoo/creme rinse and soap on the floor.  They need to add a shower caddy to hold this stuff within reach.   There was no window to open to let in the sea air and hear the ocean.  We could open the door while we were, but not at night.  One of the big reasons we like to stay by the ocean is to hear the waves :[.   The parking was difficult because we had to park uphill and hike up when we wanted to drive anywhere, but since there is limited space by the sea, we grudgingly accepted that.
Manager Response: Dear Hodoki,   Thank you for taking the time to review Sea Horse Resort. We appreciate your feedback regarding the shower caddy, and will review with our ownership team as we make design decisions in the future. We hope you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to have you back in the near future!  Ashley Sea Horse Resort

Summary Heading: Fantastic location, best staff, comfortable facilities
Summary: Have stayed here twice as a short mid week  vacation in the spring and love its location across from the pier for evening strolls and morning beach jaunts.  Easy walk to many restaurants. Dylan was incredibly helpful in every way and made it a stress free time.
Manager Response: Dear Spud1048,  We appreciate you taking the time to review your stay with us. We will share your praise with Dylan and we hope to have you back in the near future!  Ashley Sea Horse Resort

Summary: Beautiful views, large, clean, modern rooms, lovely, friendly staff - what more could you ask for! We were there for our wedding weekend, and many of our guests also stayed there. Everyone thoroughly enjoyed the hotel, and had nothing but great things to say. We will be returning year after year for our anniversary, we enjoyed it so much. I would highly recommend the Seahorse Resort!
Manager Response: Dear Chelsea M,   Thank you so much for your sparkling review. Hope to have you back to stay with us soon!  Ashley Sea Horse Resort

Summary: We had such a wonderful stay at The Seahorse Resort. We stayed in room 5A. The suite was amazing. Sunsets were unbelievable! It had everything that we needed and the views from the suite were spectacular.  I loved that the resort lends out beach chairs, beach towels and beach toys. On the same street as the resort there are a few restaurants, a coffee shop and a store that sells groceries, drinks, sunscreen etc. The staff at the Seahorse were all amazing as well!  We got to watch some pro surfers out on the water, so that was an added bonus! If you like to shop, the main street has lots of cute boutique shops and restaurants. Outlet mall only about an 8 minute drive away. Definitely will look at staying here again the next time we are there. We loved it and so did our kids!
Manager Response: Dear advtrvl,   Thank you so much for taking the time to review the hotel. We hope that the memories you and your family made while staying with us last a lifetime. Looking forward to your next visit!   Ashley

Summary: the good: across the street from the beach, close to a couple restaurants, small balcony good for sunset watching, and check-in staff was pleasant.  the bad: first, the noise - the train station is just across the street; there was a lot of traffic early in the morning; the walls are paper thin (even with earplugs you will be able to hear everything going on in the adjoining rooms). second, the window/sliding glass door faced the street/ocean and had a nearly sheer blind, so the lights of the Beachcomber Inn and street lights were visible all night. third, the room and building just look and feel like they need a refresh.  it wouldn't be so bad if it were priced accordingly.
Manager Response: Dear wandereringnow,   Thank you for taking the time to review the Sea Horse Resort. With the location and view as coveted as ours, we often tune out the commotions of the world. However, we do understand that not every guest may be able to. We value the feedback we receive from our guests and we're always working to better our service and guest experience. If you would like to further discuss your past stay with the manager we would welcome the opportunity. Please do not hesitate to reach out to the resort by calling (949) 492-1720.

Summary: What a cute place to spend a weekend!  We did a staycation for my birthday and just loved the location, the one bedroom condo, and the town of San Clemente. Located right across from the pier, the resort was super convenient to restaurants and shops. Very clean and had everything we needed, including a nice deck area to enjoy a cocktail!
Manager Response: Dear Birthday Trip!  First, thank you for choosing our resort to spend your birthday, I am happy to hear we added to the success of the occasion. Also, we appreciate the mention of our deck area, we do believe it is beautiful and a great place to relax watch the waves, and enjoy the sunsets.   Please come back and see us again, you are now family and we enjoy return visits.

Summary: San  Clemente was just a fabulous place - we drove down from LA along the coast   - we came around the corner and spotted the sea shore what a great little place - yes it is dated but  honestly everything totally adds to the charm of the place  - and character - the space in room was perfect and loved the kitchenette too ! We loved the train along the front and again found it quite quirky would Stay there again for sure ! The balcony was just perfect for sitting out in the afternoon too and the parking was handy too !
Manager Response: Dear Location Location Location  Thank you for your wonderful review we are extremely happy you found us, and also found your stay enjoyable. Next time you are here to visit ask us about are newly renovated rooms, a little more in cost, but well worth the expense... We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The Seahorse is so beautiful and peaceful. You can’t beat the location, and the accommodations are incredibly welcoming and pleasant. I could have spent my entire vacation just enjoying the view from the balcony of the Pacific Suite. Can’t recommend enough—and we loved Kayla. She was an amazing host and made us feel like special guests! We were also surprised to get a visit from Santa on Christmas Eve. Our stocking with local chocolates and other neat SC gifts was left at our door as we slept. Such a lovely and unexpected touch. The Seahorse is truly a little slice of heaven in the Spanish Village by the Sea.
Manager Response: Dear Christmas at the Seahorse  Thank you for your lovely review, we are so happy you were able to stay with us over the holidays, and the pictures you provided to TripAdvisor were greatly appreciated. In addition, thank you for letting us know about our employee's, Kayla is a wonderful agent and we have been lucky enough to have her for more than five years. However, the personal touch of mentioning and remembering an agents name is a great value to us and their performance.

Summary: We were in Villa 3 right off the harbor road. Suite was nicely remodeled, modestly but nicely furnished and decorated. Very clean. Balcony was wonderful to watch the waves, some surfers, and listen to the ocean. Has a full frig and basic dishware, pans, etc but no place to put groceries - no cupboards in the unit. There are some hooks about 4 feet off the bedroom wall to hang clothes. Would have been better to have them on a wall away from the bed and higher up, or a closet. Office supplied beach chairs, umbrellas and beach towels to use. Parking space labeled for our unit. Walking distance to downtown San Clemente although it is uphill. All in all, we loved it!
Manager Response: Dear Remodeled suite (villa)  Thank you for your review of our newest renovated addition, I believe you were our first guest. Yes! we have chosen to remove cabinets in the kitchen to go with a minimalistic and cleaner line, but learning of the missed value of hiding groceries in a cabinet, has been taken into advisement, as well as the suggestion for relocation of the hooks in the bedroom.   We are so happy you found this room enjoyable, and hope we will have the pleasure of a return visit soon.

Summary: My husband and I stayed only one night at the Seahorse Resort because of a side trip to San Clemente. There are so many things that made this overnighter memorable! First, the Amtrak depot is in front of the resort and the beach is on the other side. The staff was very helpful in signing us in and showing us the amenities for the guest, i.e. beach towels, beach chairs and beach umbrellas. Unfortunately the weather was rather chilly so we decided to pass. There are several restaurants on the same street and the San Clemente Pier was open for a leisurely walk to the end and back. In back of the hotel is a beautiful garden with umbrellas and chairs that give a spectacular view of the ocean and the surfers that were out in the chilly water. I definitely recommend this resort to
Manager Response: Dear Great January Getaway  Thank you for your lovely review and making the decision to stop at our beachside resort. We like to ensure our guest have a memorable stay and it sound like we made a great effort with you, despite the weather. We are lucky that this beautiful area despite good or bad weather does have so much to offer, with shops, restaurants, the beach and of course our lovely garden to watch the sunset. We welcome your recommendation and hope we will see you again soon.

Summary: highly recommend this property. We decided to stay two nights at this resort with our family of four. We had a suite with 1 bedroom ,1 bath,a murphy bed in the living room,a large kitchen ,dining area and a balcony at the top floor (suite 5 A). The suite was very spacious,modern,very clean and a fabulous view of the pacific ocean. We felt asleep with the sound of the waves.The beds were very comfortable . Pricing was reasonable for the location and quality . There is excellent eateries in walking distance. There is free parking area for the hotel guests. The management and staff were very friendly and helpful. Enjoy your stay :)
Manager Response: Dear great stay :)  Thank you for your wonderful review, sounds like you had the pleasure of our Pacific Deluxe one bedroom suite, (our most favored unit). The rounded turret gives the feel of viewing the ocean from a lighthouse. It also is an excellent unit for family, with a private one bedroom with a king bed, but the addition of the queen murphy bed in the living area, not only provides waking up to ocean views from the bed, but  shared accommodations for a family.   Please come visit us again soon, we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: San Clemente is a favorite spot for my husband and I. This little beachside place with its pier and grassy  sitting areas brings forth a feeling of peace and harmony, with the exception being the train horns at all times of the day and up to midnight.  This was our second time staying at The Sea Horse Resort.   The good: location, charm, amenities such as full kitchenette, parking, easy walk to nearby restaurants and wonderful walks on the pier.   The not so good: property is old and in need of updating. Details such as refrigerator being dirty on the outside and dirty chair in living room (When I pay this kind of money I have higher expectations for cleanliness) Bed is lumpy and we were really thankful that we remembered to bring our own pillows.   All in all, the view and
Manager Response: Dear Location, Location, Location  Thank you for your review of our resort, from your description it does sound like you stayed in one of our studio units.  Most of the properties rooms have been fully renovated and are a lot more spacious, but may not always provide the price advantage as the studios.  I am sadden to hear that you found the refrigerator and chair dirty, this concerns us because we very rarely have complaints on cleanliness, rooms are inspected and we have long-term employees who are very trained and conscientious. Sometimes our girls are forced to rush on a room because guest wish to check in early, I hope this wasn't a side effect of that situation. We will of course be taking this as constructive suggestions and concentrate on making sure all details are performed even when rushed.  All bedding, pillows, even mattresses are checked for cleanliness, and comfort. Annually replaced when needed, so this also concerns me. If you needed additional pillows, blankets, heaters, etc... it is most often just a request of the office and we can provide. We will also relocate a guest when availability provides us the opportunity. If you are not happy with a certain room, just ask, we will be honest and tell you what we have and if there is any additional cost to upgrade to a newly renovated or larger room.   I certainly hope that as a repeat guest, which we consider family after the second visit, that you will stay with us again, maybe allow us the opportunity of introducing you to one of our larger renovated rooms, because you will definitely not feel the property is old, even though built in the 60"s.

Summary: The room was wonderful and exceeded my expectations.  The bed was comfortable and the room clean with all the amenities.  Karen was the staff member who checked us in.  She was delightful and went beyond the call of duty to make sure everything was right.  I will definitely stay there again when I visit San Clemente.
Manager Response: Dear Awesome stay!  Wow, love the title already, gives me a warm heart. Thank you for taking the time to write a review, OOPS, this is also about me, thanks for letting me know that you were given service that was memorable. It makes all our employees feel good to know they were appreciated. I hope you will be staying with us again, because you already sound like family and we always welcome family back. Please visit us again soon!

Summary: This hotel is fantastic all around.  It has everything you could need.  The service is great and the view is fantastic.  Our room was just perfect and it is wonderful to have a kitchenette.  I would stay here again in a heartbeat.  Nathalie+John
Manager Response: Amazing View and Wonderful property  Now thats a first line I love to read, and I know the owners of this hotel will appreciate reading this review.   Well,  Natalie & John,  because the Seahorse Resort encourages repeat visits,  because we feel and try to make our guest feel like family,  please remember reunions are encourage and come back and visit us again soon.   Thank you!

Summary: i do not think many hotels/motels in the US have such an unobstructed view of the Pacific ocean like the seahorse. yes it is a little dated, and yes the parking is atrocious in this little town, but just open the window and let the breezes begin. this is what a room should feel like anywhere. and for the price, it was not too bad.  in november/december it was closer to $250. now, january at $130 per night, this place is a steal. enjoy your stay!
Manager Response: Dear wedding wonders  Thank you for your lovely review, sounds like a congratulations is in order too!    Sounds like you may have also stayed in a studio or a unit in our Coronado building, and although all rooms have been upgraded over the years, quite a few have been fully renovated, so I hope on your anniversary, you will decide to revisit with us, and stay in one of these rooms. You will definitely forget that the resort is older, our newest projects are modern, minimalistic and very beachy (hope you like Seahorses, we do our course).   Please contact us directly so we can make a suggestion, and hope to see you again!

Summary Heading: A relaxing getaway with the sounds of the ocean!
Summary: The Seahorse is a wonderful getaway from the fast pace of daily life. Unlike so many other California beaches, this feels like a charming little hideaway. I always enjoy my time here and have had the opportunity to try several different rooms, thanks to the very accommodating staff.  Dylan goes out of his way to make every stay a pleasant one.   Many of the rooms have recently been updated.  The interiors are comfortable, welcoming and tastefully decorated.  My favorite so far is 5A, with a bedroom and murphy bed in the living room. Waking up to the sounds of the ocean and a sweeping view is heaven on earth!   Truthfully, I love this place so much, I almost hate to share it!
Manager Response: Dear A relaxing getaway with sounds of the ocean!  WOW! This is a great review and please allow me to say thank you for mentioning what a great job Dylan has done. Dylan has been with us for over two years, nearly three. We are lucky that we have such a wonderful staff here.   I love that you have mentioned the newly renovated rooms, because we have done considerable upgrades and even with a property dating from the 60's this is a beautiful building and location. You couldn't have said it better for us, I actually may steal a few words from you.   We certainly look forward to your return visit and 5A will be waiting for you.......

Summary: Overall extremely pleased with the quality, price and most of all customer service. Front Studio ocean view room was perfect for our family to enjoy a nice weekend meeting friends and family. We arrived late (around midnight) which they made accommodations for us ensuring we had a parking spot close by our room, they had the heat and overall room fully prepared with lights on and very easy after a very long drive. Everyone here has been an absolute delight and very welcoming. They also have a fantastic lounge area with lots of room to lay out, look at the sunrise and sunset. We enjoyed that several times the past few days. We definitely are coming back here as we had an amazing time during our stay.
Manager Response: Dear Great view, location and price!  Thank you for such a lovely review, we certainly hope you will be visiting with us again and soon. We love providing the extra touches, an encouraged to read that they didn't go unnoticed.  Come back again soon!

Summary: After our first stay at the Seahorse Resort, we knew we would come back again... and again... and again!  We've found no other place like it for relaxation, convenience, and excellent service.  What's more relaxing than the rhythm of the ocean waves lulling you to sleep as you sink into a plush, Cal King mattress?  With the convenience of top rated restaurants and a small convenience store just steps away, you don't need a car.  In fact, if train travel is your choice, Amtrak and Metrolink share a stop within a short walk.  The Seahorse Resort staff is awesome, taking care of any special needs or requests, including securing our luggage after checkout until our homeward bound train arrived.  The casual beach style decorations throughout the Seahorse Resort add to its ambiance,
Manager Response: Dear Our Number One Getaway,  WOW! what a wonderful review, you make my heart sing when I read how our staff helped your staycation become one to remember. We are very proud of our little resort and we love the beach influences just as you did. In a cookie cutter world of hotel rooms it is nice to find a place that makes you feel at home.   Hope to see you again and soon!

Summary Heading: above and beyond perfection customer service
Summary: So i'll start with the initial concern.  I started booking with booking.com. here i booked the oceanfront deluxe 1 bedroom which i was super happy and i called the property directly to confirm my booking through this site. So when i contacted the front desk and spoke with Kayla unfortunately she informed me that the booking was just for the oceanfront 1 bedroom suite. I was very upset that this room wasn't right but not available as well. So i was considering so many different options and i wasn't succeeding with what was left. After a lot frustration Kayla went was above and beyond then what her means were and i got a call back. Kayla was amazing and she contacted the owners and they found a room exactly what i was asking for and she exceptionally made a difference with what
Manager Response: Dear above and beyond perfection customer service,  Thank you very much for your wonderful review of our hotel, although I am disappointed that you experienced an initial issue with your reservation, but extremely pleased to hear that our long-term front desk agent Kayla was able to turn your experience around. That is what we strive for here, your staycation needs to be beyond your expectations, and it truly sounds like you were able to achieve that.   We hope we will have the pleasure of your company again in the future, and don't forget to view our sister hotel Casa Sedona Inn, where the magical red rocks will spirit your cares away and listed as a "Top Romantic Inn in North America". No wonder we are also known as one of the "1000 Places to see before you die".  To Kayla we extend our appreciation for services, a job well done!

Summary: This is a fun and seren place in the middle of the action at the pier but the most calming and warm and beautiful sunsets - you can really get some great pictures.  The active pier traffic makes it fun to people watch.  The shops and little cafes are quiet in the winter and booming in the summer. We've been there at different seasons and is always a pleasant experience
Manager Response: We are very pleased you enjoyed your stay here at Seahorse and your time here in San Clemente.  Please come back and see us again soon. We promise that there will be more beautiful sunsets and gorgeous scenery to take pictures of.

Summary: I LOVE San Clemente and RARELY do I ever have something of concern to say! However, I will let you decide if this is where you would want to stay! I have stayed here before (awhile ago) & thought it was ok. But we had a wedding and wanted to get away for the weekend on a staycation!!! We live here in Town, but thought it would be nice for my husband and I to have quality alone time!  We thought we would stay here again and give it another shot! After all we have family and Friends visit and it’s nice to recommend a spot to stay at!  I made the reservation with Booking.com (great savings) and was very satisfied with their service!  Unfortunately, we were unable to find childcare and needed to cancel! I called the hotel (about 12 days in advance)  and the front desk told me, she

I have been staying here every year since the early 90s.  It has become a home away from home for my wife and I. We love the location of the hotel. We love the small beach town atmosphere. It is the best!
Manager Response: It is our pleasure having you stay with us here at the Seahorse Resort. San Clemente is indeed a little slice of heaven, we are very pleased we could be a part of your experience here. We look forward to seeing you again. Please let us know if there is anything we can do to make your future stays with us even that much more enjoyable.

Summary: Know in advance this is not a 5 star resort.  Once you have an open mind, enjoy the most beautiful view ever—right outside your front door, or go for a walk on the famous pier—literally right across the street! There’s too much to do in San Clemente to stay tied down to a room, and this place provides a clean, safe, convenient spot to stay at a very reasonable rate. The train passing at semi-regular intervals wasn’t too bad.  It was worth it to hear the waves in between.
Manager Response: We are glad you enjoyed your stay here in beautiful sunny San Clemente, and hopefully we met your standards as a 3 star resort. We hope you come back to see us again. Please let us know if there is anything we can do to make your next stay more enjoyable.

Summary: Stunning view, great location, housekeeping fantastic at their job. Rooms were nice. However I must give this hotel a 2 star. Our flight delayed leaving us in Denver and missing check in. I did call several times. Apparently annoying the gentleman taking calls for the Seahorse that evening. Checking in the following day was very unwelcome and every single encounter with office during our five days was also unpleasant. They really couldn’t have made us feel any more unwanted there. While passing other hotel next door “Hacienda”, they welcomed us asked if they could show us around. Provided local attractions and and dining ideas. We will stay with the Hacienda on our next visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay. I'm so happy you enjoyed our wonderful accommodations. I am quite confused, however, by your opinion of our front desk staff. Upon learning about your delayed flight, we did everything to assure you that your suite would be waiting for you whenever you were able to arrive. We tried our best to make it clear that you did not have anything to worry about and we would make sure you were able to access your suite at any time you arrived. We even communicated with your local family and provided them access to your suite so that you would be able to go right into your suite and rest upon arrival, instead of having to worry about coming in to complete the check in process right away. We do want all of our guests to have an enjoyable and relaxing experience with us, which is why we are a non-smoking hotel. I apologize if you were disturbed by our front desk having to contact you and remind you of this policy, but again, we want all guests to enjoy their stay. We extended many courtesies to you, including not charging you for smoking and instead issuing warnings. We also did not charge you for the damages sustained to your suite. Again, I want to emphasize that our job here is to make every single guest feel welcome and extend any help that we are able to provide to guarantee an enjoyable stay.

Summary: The resort is right across the street from the beach and pier. We stayed one street back, but still had an ocean view. There was a huge deck with a table, chairs and an umbrella. All of our windows and doors opened with screens, which is good since there is no a/c. That made it really stuffy and stale smelling when we first arrived. It looked like the top of the fridge hadn’t been dusted in years. The beds were really uncomfortable. There is one designated parking space per room. It was a nice stay, but I wouldn’t stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honesty. Thank you for letting us know about the dust on top of the fridge. I will be bringing that to the attention of our housekeeping staff immediately.  We are currently updating all our rooms, including the beds. We have not gotten to all the rooms yet unfortunately. If you do decide to stay with us again, please call our front desk directly. We will make sure you are placed in one of our newly renovated rooms.

Summary: We Really enjoyed our stay, picking a place to go 1700 miles away over the net is a risk, especially at these prices. The Seahorse Exceeded our expectation's. We had 2nd floor Ocean front , nice size room , kitchen and a large balcony. An older building but updated and clean. Came with a designated parking spot for our rental car. The cleaning lady was invisible, despite our coming and going the room was Always clean ( Thank You )  Location is Great, walking distance to a few shops & restaurants and a short drive or uber to town, shops, bars ect. .Check in with Mis" I'm Sorry" was sketchy, otherwise Dylan was at the desk and he is Awesome. Great Place, I would go back
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share this great feedback. I am delighted you had such an enjoyable time, and I will pass along your compliments to our housekeeping staff. Thank you for being our guest and I hope you will join us again soon.  Dylan Heath Guest Services Seahorse Resort San Clemente

Summary Heading: Beautiful view from our balcony. Conveniently located across from the San Clemente Pier
Summary: The Seahorse Resort is very conveniently located across the street from the San Clemente Pier and our room had a balcony with beautiful views of the pier and ocean.  The bathroom and kitchen in the 1 bedroom apartment were both a little dated, but very clean.  The room also came with a dedicated parking spot, which was a bonus.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us! We are so happy you were able to enjoy the stunning views of the Pacific from your balcony. Please visit us again, we are working hard to make our suites even more comfortable. Visit our website and check out our newly available Deluxe Suites!

Summary: Great reviews from others that want to stay on the beach with sacrifice for room condition.The walls are paperthin and hall lights shine into room all night. The train is so loud it feels like it's in the room. You can here the fan for grill at restaurant below. You have to haul your suitcases, ice chest down narrow flight of stairs. I didn't sleep at all so if you gotta be at the beach to for it.

We chose an upgraded upper floor room as street level would be significantly noisier.Located almost opposite the san clemente pier we enjoyed great seaviews and sunsets from our generously sized living area.  We chose the property for its location and this did not disappoint.Some negatives: shower worked fine but tiling could do with renewal.Kitchen was well equipped with various machines but featured very old and poor kitchen cabinetry.Minimal mugs ,crockery and cutlery. Good tv with plenty of channels but very poor lighting in living area: not possible to read in the evenings.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review!

Summary Heading: SHHHH! Don't give away my secret favorite place.
Summary: Fell upon this place 2 years ago. Went back last Summer and wouldn't stay anyplace else in San Clemente. Peaceful, Beach side, Quaint and Affordable! Close to San Diego AND L.A.  Great restaurants with in walking distance.

Summary Heading: Large suites with kitchens, balconies. Affordable
Summary: We booked two rooms at the last minute. This place is within walking distance of the San Clemente Pier and the main strip pf Restaurants and Bars and Shops.  Parking was provided with each room. Each room had a nice view of the ocean from the balconies. The rooms were large, had full kitchens, a full bathroom and a bedroom. Quiet neighborhood. Affordable considering the location and room size.

We stayed at this hotel on our way to visit San Diego. We booked a one bedroom seafront unit that was reasonably priced. When we arrived I was astounded by the location and views. I have never really considered San Clemente as a vacation destination but this experience changed my mind. When we checked into our room I was very happy with the size of the room. The living room and dining area was very large and the unit had windows that wrapped around so that the views were maximized. It also had a small balcony with great views. My only complaint is that the furniture is a little dated but the chairs were still comfortable. We also made good use of the kitchen. We made dinner and breakfast and there are great ocean views from the kitchen. This is not a full service resort. There

Have stayed at this resort many times with my family.  The main section has been updated and the two-bedroom suite on the upper floor corner is just the best ever.  Large, light and bright and a whole wall of windows looking right out over the ocean and pier.  Nice kitchen pretty well equipped especially if you are only doing a bit of cooking for breakfast and lunch.  We eat dinner at one of the pier restaurants or at one of the places on the street.  This past weekend, we stayed in one of the buildings that was not refurbished so the bath and kitchen were not the latest, but they were still more than functional and it was a nice size. The beds are new and all of their beds and bedding at this resort are good quality.  Our balcony looked right out at the sea and was large with a

Summary Heading: Inn Resort - NOT !!   Old apartments - YES !!
Summary: If you are expecting a Hotel Room with typical modern day amenities - move on to another Hotel. These are 50-60 year old Single Room Apartments that have a great location but nothing has been done to these apartments except flooring. Small Small Small.  Very expensive for what you get. No pride of ownership.   Did I mention great location?  Great location. Just a lousy place to stay for the price.  Shower did not work in the old Bathtub+Shower Combo - turn the knob and nothing. Fortunately the Bathtub worked but the stopper did not. Arg!!  Onto the sink - the stopper did not work there either.

Perfect location for a family beach weekend!  We had 8 family members split into two suites and the only thing I would do differently next time is to request rooms in same building if available.  Rooms were clean, full kitchen, designated parking and location across from the beach made it very convenient .  The staff was friendly and very accommodating.

I grew up just north of San Clemente so you think I wouldn't be giddy about the view from our deck at The Seahorse. Wrong! Quintessential old-school beach scene. There's nothing like falling asleep to crashing waves. And passing trains. And traffic. But those little noise issues were inconsequential to the overall experience. Warm and welcoming staff. Coupon for a free coffee at a cute shop two doors down. Clean and very comfy bed. If you want the Ritz, go north 5 miles (literally). Loved it!

I am not sure what goes on at this hotel, but something isn't right, and it starts with the people who sit at the front desk. The place is dirty, run down.. and when you complain, you might get moved to another room, and then have someone trying to get into your room, with a key..in the middle of the night...but guess what.. you have no land line and your cell phone doesn't work. The guy that owns the place doesn't care. Single girl traveling with her son..it was very frightening.. after letting them know.. no phone call, nothing. NEVER.AGAIN.

We stayed for 3 nights/4days at this quaint, beach apartment-style room by the sea.  It set the perfect stage for our San Clemente stay.  The ocean front view was amazing!  The price was affordable (around $200/night).  We were surprised by the full kitchen.  There were 3 in our party and the room had 2 queen sized beds and a comfy couch.  The patio-deck was perfect to wind down in the evenings and we bought take-in one night and enjoyed dinner while watching the sunset.  The Resort provided great beach chairs, towels and beach umbrellas.  The weather was perfect, although there was some pesky marine layer that hung around a little too long during our stay.  We va-cayed Sun-Wed and the only reason I wouldn't rate 5 stars is due to some noisy construction/maintenance right across

Summary Heading: Great apartment in a fabulous location
Summary: We stayed in apartment 3a which provided fabulous nearly 180 degree views through large windows across the beach and ocean literally only a few yards away.  We had a very well equipped kitchen and a separate bedroom at the back which proved to be extremely quiet and comfortable each night.  The living area was large and there was plenty of space for the large dining table and 4 chairs etc.  in terms of location it could not be beaten within walking distance of the pier, beach, restaurants, a small store and downtown only 10-15 minutes away.    There was also a small balcony with two chairs and a small table which was ideal when sitting outside looking across the ocean and generally unseen unseen by people walking on the sidewalk below.  The apartment, though, is "of the 70s" and

At the very last minute we needed a place to stay in San Clemente, and rather than getting a motel by the freeway, we decided to call the Sea Horse Resort. They had a vacancy in one of their Villa del Mar units which was a few buildings north of the Sea Horse Resort. The unit turned out to be a good-sized apartment in an old building with a view of the pier and the water. The bedroom had two queen-size beds, a full kitchen, and a nice living/dining room with a balcony facing the street. It would probably be good for a family of 4 or 5.  Pros: •comfortable bed, firm pillows, good linens •good water pressure in the shower •comfortable furniture •TV  •free WIFI •parking space near unit •great view of ocean and pier •unit is above a coffee shop, a small cafe and small convenience

I really enjoyed my visit to San Clemente and waking up to the water view was perfect. The location was also very close to restaurants and shops. There are many quality restaurants a short ride away or you can cook in your suite. I will be back!

First, we planned to stay for 2 nights in a suite with one bed and ocean view. After our first night we were wo happy to stay on this suite that we asked to stay one more night. The staff was very friendly and  booked the additional night immediately. Clean room, bath and kitchen. Very adorable view and 'cause this room is not directly at the promenade, it's rather quite for an affordable sleep.

Summary Heading: Clean but over priced for season
Summary: On a one night stay I think this room was over priced. It was $250 and change For a 2 room 2nd floor room with deck overlooking water. Our view was of restaurant across the street and the peer. Commuter train not a bothersome. Rooms in need of upgrading. One heat unit in living room area which does not flow well to the back rooms which where cold. They do provide a space heater but not saficient for 2 rooms. The girls at the desk and on phone where great. Having never been to that area before, guess you live and learn.

We had a very good stay at this hotel.  Staff were friendly and accommodating,the location is great (close to beach).  Ocean view was beautiful. Rooms are very basic and need upgrading but clean.  There is a road between hotel and beach and a commuter train goes by but it was not too bothersome and is quiet at night.

Summary Heading: Great find in with a view
Summary: We stayed in a two bedroom suite Oct 15th. We did not have a reservation but stopped in and got the last room they had. It was a short walk from the office but a great view of the beach.   Staff was very friendly and made sure we were happy with everything.  They had a number of beach chairs and towels to use for free at the office.   A short little walk across the street and the beach and pier are all yours to enjoy.  If you stay a the sea bourse you should not be disappointed.

Summary Heading: Great view if you book an upper floor room
Summary: The bargain rates are for the ground floor rooms which offer very little privacy.  Expect to pay a pretty penny if you want an upper floor room with a view.  Rooms were clean and there is a large kitchen.  They "coiunt" the futon in the living room as a bed and we did not need it but I would not expect anyone over the age of 6 to enjoy sleeping on it.  The view can't be beat but I did not know the train roars by frequently.  I personally don't mind trains so I was OK but if you are not expecting it, it can be noisy.  Bed was OK but furniture and the overall look of the place while very clean, was dated.  You are paying $$$ for the great location.

Hotel is on a great location close to the san clemente pier and the dog friendly coastal trail. We enjoyed being walking distance to restaurants, casa romantica, downtown shopping. I liked that they allow you to borrow beach chairs and beach towels. There were somethings that really bothered me during our stay. 1) I found a big cockroach in the bathroom. 2)The street lights are also bright at night 3) When we tried to sit outside in our patio (which we paid a lot more for) we kept getting wet by the wet bathing suits on the top level floors 4) they don't allow glass and pets on the upstairs patio. I would consider staying here again but in another room.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us! We truly have a very special treasure in the heart of Southern California. We would love to welcome you back in one of our upper floor suites. All of our ocean front suites offer balconies which make it that much nicer to enjoy the ocean air and spectacular views. Although we make every effort to make sure all guests our comfortable, there are at times some factors that are out of our control. In an effort to make all guests comfortable, we do ask that pets and glassware be kept out of our beautiful ocean front garden. This way, all guests will feel free to enjoy the garden and  relax to the tune of the ocean waves.

Summary Heading: Absolutely great location ... not so great accomodations
Summary: I write this review with mixed emotions from our stay at the Sea Horse.  The location is absolutely fantastic.  When I say you are near the beach, take it literally.  We stayed in Villa #3 and were less than 60 seconds walk to the pier and beach.  I didn't wear shoes for 4 days.  It was fantastic.  We sat on the our patio and people-watched (very interesting), watched the waves, and even watched the surfers on the break north of the pier.  I was concerned about the Amtrak right across the street, but it was never a distractions from the environment. New rules limit the ability of the engineers to blow the horn.  The train passes in seconds a few times per day.  The not so fantastic part of this review is the unit itself.  If you've read other reviews of the Sea Horse, than
Manager Response: We so appreciate your stay with us! We take great pride in providing accommodations that make our guests return time and time again. I am disappointed to hear your concerns. We will do everything possible to alleviate any issues. We have been quite busy renovating many of our suites and in particular, our Villa suites have been fitted with new carpeting and furniture throughout. We have several types of suites available and would be more than happy to show our guests the suite that will fit their needs best.

Summary: Front desk lady was very nice and helpful, even calling us be before we got there to check on our trip. We were helped with directions, umbrellas for the beach and room services were perfect. We could see the ocean from our balcony. Loved our stay! Everything was perfect!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being our guest! I am so happy to hear you were well taken care of by our staff. It is our goal to make sure all guests enjoy their time in our little slice of paradise! It sure is nice to know you don't have to pack the bulky beach items like umbrellas, towels and beach chairs. We have that taken care of and offer these items complimentary to all guests. Oh, and we also have some fun beach toys for the little ones :) We can't wait to welcome you back in the future!

Summary: San Clemente is one of my favorite places to visit. The Seahorse makes it home. We have stayed many times, and Andy and his crew always make us feel like friends. Comfortable rooms, clean, and a great location.
Manager Response: As we are a family owned and managed business, one of the highest compliments we can receive is knowing that our guests feel like they're coming home when they visit us. Thank you so much for coming back to stay with us! We have had the pleasure of getting so know so many families through the years, first as our parents started this business and now as we continue their legacy. We have families that have been coming for over 30 years and are delighted when we meet new groups that we can share our home with and help make lasting memories.

Summary: Big splurge......$245. That's a lot for two senior travelers. But what the heck, it's a resort, not really. The positive......our room, #6, had a patio overlooking the pier, the ocean, the train tracks (to be fair, if you want to see the ocean you have to see the trains). A wonderful lounge area also overlooked the coast. The negatives....there are no amenities. Our room had no windows we could open, so at night there was no fresh air. The sleeping area was separated from the sitting area by a 3/4 wall. There was no a/c (again to be fair, if we had fresh air we opulent need or want an a/c). This is not a resort. This is a nice, expensive inn with a spectacular view
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us :) Our studios are awesome rooms for those looking to stay on the ocean front at the most economical price.  As most hotels on the water, the ocean breeze provides the cool air needed to relax and enjoy. Our ground floor studios do offer a fan system that brings the cool outside air in to circulate around your room. Or, next time we would be delighted to offer you an upper floor studio that would be great for you as you can leave the sliding balcony door open and sleep to the sounds of the rolling waves. During the day, please enjoy complimentary beach chairs, towels and umbrellas down on the sand or step outside onto our gorgeous garden area and relax on one of our sun loungers as you take in the warm sunshine rays!

Summary: Lovely, clean, boutique type hotel - like a small apartment; directly across from the pier.  We could see surfers all day from our balcony.  Great little crepe restaurant below (for breakfast), walking trail across the street, along the beach.  There are train tracks across the street that you could hear occasionally, but didn't bother us.  Awesome view of the ocean directly across the street!  Would definitely recommend this place!
Manager Response: We're so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us! It sounds like you made the most of your time by doing exactly what you should be doing when you come to the beach - relax on your private ocean front balcony, eat delicious food, and take a nice beachside stroll! Of course, if you do feel like cooking here and there, our suites provide fully equipped kitchens so you can stay in and enjoy a meal with a view! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The PROS: The view and cool ocean breezes from our patio was fantastic. So relaxing and it was a wonderful mini vacation with friends from Colorado and Texas. The access to the beach was great! Sunset and a glass of wine from the patio, what else does one need! Kayla was very nice and helpful. The CONS: Older building and sparsely decorated. Very small kitchen and bathroom. Also very noisy - cars, people, and of course the train, but it didn't impact us that much. I wish they would put black out curtains on the bedroom windows though, that morning sun comes in early and bright!

Summary Heading: Noisy neighbors, smoking next door  neighbors and limited view of the ocean.
Summary: This is a non smoking hotel but obviously some people think differently. Within minutes of check in I am  sitting on the deck trying to see the ocean I am greeted with a huge cloud of smoke from the neighbors.  I reported immediately but no one was in the office. Later that evening the smoke was of a different nature but of course they were from Colorado. Workmen were across the street with a generator, more noise when you want a little peace and quiet.  I assumed a would have a view of the ocean, I had a glimpse of the ocean in three different places. EXTREMELY noisy neighbors on the back street behind us in another building but this is where the bedroom was situated. WIth no ac and windows open I could hear the whole arguement of this couple. Lights from the buildings behind

The views are terrific, the rooms are unique (not cookie cutter motel) and the management is professional....this is not the place for those seeking luxury...this is the ideal place for those who appreciate a unique funky beach experience.  Close to good bars and restaurants and easy walking distance to the old town of San Clemente.  Good wifi...the only downside for some is no air conditioning....not a big deal for us, but some may be uncomfortable.

Summary Heading: The perfect vacation present to myself.
Summary: I had a 3rf floor studio room with gorgeous view of the beach, ocean and the pier. There was a comfy queen bed facing the sliding glass door. There is a bistro table and 2 chairs by the door so you can eat with a view. There are also 2 comfy chairs and small table outside on the balcony that allow for watching the beautiful sunsets. There was a small mini-fridge and coffee maker in the room. The negatives were a lack of ice/vending machines onsite. There is a small market at the corner though where you can purchase necessities.
